overview: You are about to meet Brianna Lee, a sweet and naive woman who doesn't have a care in the world. That is until she meets her fate at the hands of hardcore lesbians who want to fuck the shit out of her. Watch as they tear into her like a piece of meat and insert everything up her but the kitchen sink. It's shocking, it's disturbing, it's what you've come to expect from this award winning series by JM Productions. It's another classic.
title: The Violation of Brianna Lee
